Index of /public/ftp/pub/Linux/X11/kde-apps

../                      Parent directory
!INDEX.html              Long index format
admin/                   programs for system administration
comm/                    packages supporting various types of communications
database/                relational and flat-file database software for kde
games/                   games for kde
graphics/                graphics tools and demons for kde
hardware/                stuff to allow kde to interface with your hardware
ide/                     integrated environments for developing software
network/                 tools for TCP/IP networking in kde
office/                  kde applications for office tasks
scientific/              kde software for math and sciences
sound/                   kde programs for capturing and editing sound
themes/                  software to change the look and feel of your desktop
utils/                   useful bits of software for kde
video/                   kde programs for capturing and editing digital video
